name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael Louis SILVERMAN, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent and would decide the appeal on its merits.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael Louis SILVERMAN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent and would decide the appeal on its merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. Healey, Healey, Davidson & Hornack, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Claire C. Capristo, Deputy Dist. Atty., Michael W. Streily, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 160
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael Louis SILVERMAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 29, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
Michael J. Healey, Healey, Davidson & Hornack, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Claire C. Capristo, Deputy Dist. Atty., Michael W. Streily, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
